title: A true Eddlian
description: Eddie, the founder of the EddieHub community, is a true leader in the tech industry. He founded the successful LinkFree project and served as an incredible mentor to those around him. He has a unique ability to share his knowledge and experience in an approachable and impactful way. His guidance and support have significantly and positively impacted my career. I highly recommend Eddie as a mentor, leader, and community builder. He is an asset to any organization or project.
